title: A letter from the Lord General Monck, and the officers here, to the several and respective regiments, and other forces in England, Scotland and Ireland.
author: Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.
notes: Desiring the Army's adherence to the plan of dissolving the Rump and electing a free Parliament.
Reproductions of the originals in the Harvard University Library (Early English books), and the British Library (Thomason Tracts).
